processingCommand.script:
:SET &STOP_PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DR-NTV.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,STOP_PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &CRONTAB_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DR-NTV.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,CRONTAB_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &UPDATE_DB_PASS_WMS_SCRIPT# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DB-PASS-CHANGE.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,UPDATE_DB_PASS_WMS_SCRIPT,1)
:SET &UPDATE_DB_PASS_REFS_SCRIPT# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DB-PASS-CHANGE.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,UPDATE_DB_PASS_REFS_SCRIPT,1)

:PUB &STOP_PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME#
:PUB &CRONTAB_SCRIPT_NAME#
:PUB &UPDATE_DB_PASS_WMS_SCRIPT#
:PUB &UPDATE_DB_PASS_REFS_SCRIPT#

! Restart modules
:SET &WMS_UPDATE#      = "false"
:SET &REFS_UPDATE#     = "false"
:SET &EMS_UPDATE#       = "false"
:SET &WMS_FAIL_UPDATE#  = "false"
:SET &REFS_FAIL_UPDATE# = "false"
:SET &EMS_FAIL_UPDATE#  = "false"

:IF &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &WMS_UPDATE# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &REFS_UPDATE# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &EMS_UPDATE# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &WMS_FAIL_UPDATE# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &REFS_FAIL_UPDATE# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &EMS_FAIL_UPDATE# = "true"
:ENDIF

:PUBLISH &WMS_UPDATE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_UPDATE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_UPDATE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_FAIL_UPDATE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_FAIL_UPDATE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_FAIL_UPDATE#,,WORKFLOW
